description: Numbers that are the sum of 2 different primes.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9225
maple: isA038609 := proc(n)    local i,p,q;    for i from 1 do        p := ithprime(i) ;        if 2*p > n then            return false;        fi;        q := n-p ;        if q <= p then            return false ;        end if;        if isprime(q) then            return true;        end if;    end do:end proc:n :=1 :for c from 1 do    if isA038609(c) then        printf("%d %d\n",n,c) ;        n := n+1 ;    end if;end do: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 09 2014
author: Vasiliy Danilov (danilovv(AT)usa.net) 1998 Jul
